query:
UPDATE customers SET
  address = '123 Main Street, Windhoek, Namibia',
  primary_contact_name = 'John Smith',
  primary_contact_phone = '+264 61 123 4567',
  primary_contact_email = 'orders@' || LOWER(REPLACE(name, ' ', '')) || '.com.na',
  accounts_contact_name = 'Mary Johnson',
  accounts_contact_phone = '+264 61 123 4568',
  accounts_contact_email = 'accounts@' || LOWER(REPLACE(name, ' ', '')) || '.com.na',
  account_manager = 'Sarah Williams',
  credit_limit = 50000.00,
  current_balance = 12500.00,
  payment_due_date = CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '30 days'
WHERE address IS NULL;
